text: aur banee isarail ka rasool (qaraar dega aur vah unase yoon kahega ki) main tumhaare paas tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraf se (apanee naboovat kee) yah nishaanee lekar aaya hoon ki main gundheen huee mittee se ek parinde kee soorat banaaooaiga fir us par (kuchh) dam karoonga to vo khuda ke hukm se udane lagega aur main khuda hee ke hukm se maadarazaad (paidaayashee) andhe aur kodhee ko achchha karoonga aur murdo ko zinda karoonga aur jo kuchh tum khaate ho aur apane gharon mein jama karate ho main (sab) tumako bata doonga agar tum eemaanadaar ho to beshak tumhaare liye in baaton mein (meree naboovat kee) badee nishaanee hai
